citation.abstract: Purpose of the Study: The study investigates whether productive activities by older adults reduce bodily inflammation, as indicated by C-reactive protein (CRP), a biomeasure associated with the risk of cardiovascular diseases.
citation.title: Do Productive Activities Reduce Inflammation in Later Life? Multiple Roles, Frequency of Activities, and C-Reactive Protein

news.title: Older volunteers in better physical health than younger peers
news.summary: Adults 70 or older who regularly volunteer are in better physical health than those just a few years younger, according to new research from Purdue University.
